articles.description: The Vega rocket is being prepared for the nineteenth launch of Europe’s small lift vehicle,…
articles.content: The Vega rocket is being prepared for the nineteenth launch of Europes small lift vehicle, the second Vega launch of 2021, as well as the seventh Arianespace mission of the year. Arianespace flight V… [+5218 chars]
